definitions.definition: A sport in which participants ride a form of wakeboard or surfboard harnessed to a large kite which is controlled by the rider.
A similar sport using a wheeled board on land.
A similar sport using a snowboard or ski on snow.

main_definition: A sport in which participants ride a form of wakeboard or surfboard harnessed to a large kite which is controlled by the rider.
secondary_definitions: A similar sport using a wheeled board on land.
A similar sport using a snowboard or ski on snow.
